questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Kugenzura inyiyumvo zawe
Gutatura impari n'amatati
kwubaka ubwonko bwawe

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kwitaho ugukurikira no gufata ku mutwe inkuru
Gufasha abanyeshure kuvuga, kwibuka no kwerekana ibishobisho bitandukanye
Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya ibitera amatati biciye mu kubaza ibibazo

questions.question: Ni akahe karorero kamwe ko mu bibazo bitanu ubaza mu gihe c'amatati?
answers: Ni ayahe mazina yawe?
Ni hehe amatati yabereye?
Ufise basazawe na bashikawe bangahe?

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guha amahirwe abanyeshure bashoboye kwishura ibibazo bitanu vyose
Notegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure mukuvuga inkuru zibaho canke izo biyumviriye zitabayeho.
Sinotegerezwa gutanga uturorero tw'amatati mu gukabura abanyeshure

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guhana abanyeshure mu gihe badashoboye kwishure ibibazo bitanu vyose
Notegerezwa guhagarika kwimenyereza agakorwa mu gihe abanyeshure badashoboye kwishura ibibazo vyose bitanu
Notegerezwa guhindura umutwe w'icigwa c'amatati igihe cose twimenyereje

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa gurakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure mu kwandika inyishu zabo
Sinotegerezwa guhata abanyeshure kuvuga udukuru tw'amatati nyakuri
Sinotegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure mu kugerageza kwishura ibibazo bitanu neza birenze ubushozi bwabo

questions.question: Ni ibiki umunyeshure yotegerezwa kuvuga mu gihe co kurongora ikiganiro muri kano gakorwa?
answers: Umuntu wese ni ngirakamaro mu murwi kandi bose bategerezwa kubamwo
Aka gakorwa kampa kwumva ntekanye no gushobora kwitaho ibintu
Dutegerezwa ibihe vyose kubaza ibibazo bitanu mu gihe turi mu matati

questions.question: Wotegerezwa gukora iki mu gihe abanyeshure bariko barishura ibibazo bitanu mu nyishu ntonto?
answers: Guhagarika kwimenyereza aka gakorwa nkaca ntangura ikindi cigwa
Gusaba abanyeshure kwongeramwo ibibazo bijanye na kimwe kimwe muri bimwe bitanu nka "ico caguteye kwiyumva gute?"
kubwira abanyeshure ko badashoboye muri kano gakorwa.
